name: Cook Supreme
description:
Put your chef hat on and get ready for some baking action in the latest Cooking game guaranteed to satisfy your sweet tooth.

As a honest, community-driven man, you are baking a cake for your local charity fundraising event. The question is, what cake?

Choose from a plethora of ingredients, equipment, flavours and colours to make your cake SPECIAL! Take control of the method, or go freestyle! and you'll soon be the #1 fundraiser in your town!

Please note that in its current state, you cannot bake a cake.
